articles.description: The rate at which Apple brings out new versions of its devices and technology means it can be hard to keep up with.
articles.content:
Millions of iPhone users have been warned their mobile devices could become dangerous this week.
It may be time for an upgrade as older iPhones will be cut off from the latest software updates.
The… [+1398 chars]

articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.title: This Windows Bug Is So Bad Even Windows 7 Is Getting a Patch - How-To Geek
articles.description: The regular updates your PC gets might seem annoying occasionally, but they’re critical to keep your PC safe online. Case in point: Microsoft has released a patch for a zero-day vulnerability affecting all Windows computers.
articles.content:
How-To Geek / Microsoft
